description: List of all stations, their capacities and locations. REQUIRED of systems utilizing docks.

last_updated.description: Last time the data in the feed was updated in RFC3339 format.

ttl.description: Number of seconds before the data in the feed will be updated again (0 if the data should always be refreshed).

version.description: GBFS version number to which the feed conforms, according to the versioning framework (added in v1.1).

data.description: Array that contains one object per station as defined below.

short_name.description: Short name or other type of identifier.

cross_street.description: Cross street or landmark where the station is located.

region_id.description: Identifier of the region where the station is located.

post_code.description: Postal code where station is located.

station_opening_hours.description: Hours of operation for the station in OSM opening_hours format.

rental_methods.description: Payment methods accepted at this station.

is_virtual_station.description: Is this station a location with or without physical infrastructure? (added in v2.1-RC)

station_area.description: A multipolygon that describes the area of a virtual station (added in v2.1-RC).

parking_type.description: Type of parking station. Added in v2.3

parking_hoop.description: Are parking hoops present at this station? Added in v2.3

contact_phone.description: Contact phone of the station. Added in v2.3

capacity.description: Number of total docking points installed at this station, both available and unavailable.

vehicle_types_capacity.description: This field's value is an array of objects containing the keys vehicle_type_ids and count defined below. These objects are used to model the parking capacity of virtual stations (defined using the is_virtual_station field) for each vehicle type that can be returned to this station.

vehicle_type_ids.description: The vehicle_type_ids, as defined in vehicle_types.json, that may park at the virtual station.

count.description: A number representing the total number of vehicles of the specified vehicle_type_ids that can park within the virtual station.

vehicle_docks_capacity.description: This field's value is an array of objects containing the keys vehicle_type_ids and count defined below. These objects are used to model the total docking capacity of a station, both available and unavailable, for each type of vehicle that may dock at this station.

vehicle_type_ids.description: An array of strings where each string represents a vehicle_type_id that is able to use a particular type of dock at the station.

count.description: A number representing the total number of docks at the station, both available and unavailable, that may accept the vehicle types specified by vehicle_type_ids.

is_valet_station.description: Are valet services provided at this station? (added in v2.1-RC)

is_charging_station.description: Does the station support charging of electric vehicles? (added in v2.3-RC)

rental_uris.description: Contains rental uris for Android, iOS, and web in the android, ios, and web fields (added in v1.1).

android.description: URI that can be passed to an Android app with an intent (added in v1.1).

ios.description: URI that can be used on iOS to launch the rental app for this station (added in v1.1).

web.description: URL that can be used by a web browser to show more information about renting a vehicle at this station (added in v1.1).
